reviews.text:
Executive Summary
MidState Credit Union is migrating a 2-million-record loan database from an aging on-premises SQL Server to Azure SQL Database and Amazon Kinesis by year-end.
reviews.reason_text: Migrate 2 million records from SQL Server to Azure.

reviews.text: Driven by regulators flagging the data center’s single point of failure, this migration aims to improve reliability while retiring the outdated risk calculator.
The roadmap balances the mandated migration with the CFO’s expectation for real-time ML risk scoring, focusing on a feasible approach given no data science resources or budget.
reviews.reason_text: Balance migration with CFO's expectation for ML scoring.

reviews.text:
In-Scope Migration
Migrate 2 million loan records from on-premises SQL Server to Azure SQL Database, eliminating the single point of failure.
Replace legacy DTS jobs with modern cloud ETL processes to maintain data workflows.
reviews.reason_text: Replace legacy DTS with modern ETL.

reviews.text: Decommission the legacy VB risk calculator and implement an interim risk-scoring method until a new ML solution is ready.
Set up a new Azure environment configured for high availability and compliance.
reviews.reason_text: Set up Azure environment for high availability and compliance.

reviews.text: Integrate Amazon Kinesis for real-time streaming to support future ML-driven analytics.

Out-of-Scope
✗ Development of an ML risk scoring system by the migration deadline (no data science team or budget).
reviews.reason_text: No data science or budget available.

reviews.text: ✗ Adopting third-party migration or ETL tools (limited to native Azure services and in-house methods).
reviews.reason_text: Adopt third-party tools limited to Azure.

reviews.text: ✗ Continued operation of the legacy VB risk calculator after migration.

| ROI
Batch ML risk model | 5 | Moderate
Real-time ML risk scoring | 8 | High
Continuous-learning AI model | 13 | Risks & Questions
reviews.reason_text: ROI data table without enforceable action.

reviews.text: [NOTE: legacy DTS] Rewriting legacy DTS packages in a modern ETL environment may be error-prone due to lack of documentation.
reviews.reason_text: Potential errors in DTS due to lack of documentation.

reviews.text: No in-house data science expertise to deliver the CFO’s ML risk scoring vision, so external help may be needed.
reviews.reason_text: Obligation to find external help due to lack of in-house expertise.

reviews.text: An aggressive year-end deadline may strain resources, risking cut corners or migration issues if complexities arise.
reviews.reason_text: Risk of resource strain due to deadline complexities.

reviews.text: Open questions remain about the new Azure/Kinesis setup (compliance, staff training, and cloud cost management).
reviews.reason_text: Open questions about Azure setup compliance and costs.
